data.title: Companies – Winmo
data.text:
Explore a detailed list of current and past ad agencies that work with Platinum Equity Holdings. Sort its marketing agencies by the type of services they offer including creative, PR, media planning, media buying and more. With Winmo’s detailed database of Platinum Equity Holdings's advertising agencies at your fingertips you will quickly be able to answer questions like these:

How many brands does Platinum Equity Holdings have?

Platinum Equity Holdings has 2 unique brands.

How much does Platinum Equity Holdings spend on media?

Platinum Equity Holdings spends $11350 on media.

Winmo tracks marketing team contacts brand by brand (budget by budget), with an update cycle of sixty days for maximum accuracy. With Winmo, you can get detailed information on the entire Platinum Equity Holdings marketing team. Find basics on each marketer such as name, job title, brand responsibilities, email, and direct phone number, as well as current marketing strategies, areas of media investment, and do’s and don’ts for engaging. Here’s the kinds of questions you’ll be able to quickly answer with our database:

Who is the CMO at Platinum Equity Holdings?

The chief marketing officer at Platinum Equity Holdings is N/A.

How big is the Platinum Equity Holdings Marketing Team?

There are 6 staff members currently involved in marketing for Platinum Equity Holdings.

This section digs into the specifics of the advertising spend at Platinum Equity Holdings and activity across channels such as Out of Home, Radio, Broadcast, Print, Digital Display, CTV, Digital Video and Social Media, highlighting their peak buying times, media mix, and a month over month comparison.

Platinum Equity Holdings Media Mix

Explore a detailed breakdown of the last 12 months media spending for Platinum Equity Holdings across various advertising channels including digital, broadcast, print, radio and more. Those channels can then be broken down further and viewed monthly or quarterly.
